text:
Could the vaccine offer hope to COVID long-haulers? Are people still suffering with loss of taste & smell months after recovery? These Q's & more, in our 
FACT/FICTION report. Tune in at 5:45 @WPXI @AHNtoday #COVID19 #vaccine #FactFiction #COVIDlonghaulers #TasteAndSmell https://t.co/Qmrz3XrT9s
